FYI: 600 Roma families were forced to live for years in camps in Kosovo the UN built on land contaminated by a former lead-smelting factory. UN took action in 2000 to protect its peacekeepers from exposure to lead waste - but did not act on behalf of the Roma families until 2006.
Sucks to be you, Roma .

The Senior Choir & the Gospel Choir are travelling to Rome today to take part in the Roma Music Festival. They will perform in the Pantheon and the Concert Hall in Rome on Friday & Saturday. The girls are really looking forward to this fabulous experience.
